name: The Idolmaster One For All
description:
The Idolmaster One For All is an action-arcade game. It was originally released in 2014.
The Idolmaster One For All is available on PlayStation 3.
Masataka Katō and Yōzō Sakagami produced the game. It was directed by Akihiro Ishihara and Munehiro Koyanagi.
